mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,CREATOR ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES (#{boardType} ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_NUM), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}) ,#{boardTitle} ,#{boardComment} ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
